title: GZgidnick
author: GZgidnick
content: I am new here and this is my first post.It is about project that you truly and deeply love despite price action despite adoption despite social engagement.Such project can only be a deeply technical project, novel offering, unique and complex like no other out there.Ambitions project that aims to solve major problem; - sometimes a problem that we may not even face in the near future...Lets say a project like Kaspa and Truebit.......

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: GZgidnick on March 19, 2023, 12:18:28 PM[.....]It is about project that you truly and deeply love despite price action despite adoption despite social engagement.I don't have any loyalty or love to any crypto project since I started and I don't think that will ever change. If I have no option but to choose one that I'm going "trust" then I would still pick bitcoin. I mean it's still going through many developments despite all the criticisms and regulatory pressure. It's been over a decade since the genesis block and still.QuoteLets say a project like Kaspa and Truebit.......Who? Or should I say what are they?

comments.author: Retainly_Collie
comments.body: Quote from: GZgidnick on March 19, 2023, 12:18:28 PMI am new here and this is my first post.It is about project that you truly and deeply love despite price action despite adoption despite social engagement.Such project can only be a deeply technical project, novel offering, unique and complex like no other out there.Ambitions project that aims to solve major problem; - sometimes a problem that we may not even face in the near future...Lets say a project like Kaspa and Truebit.......You use a comparison that I am also quite confused, this cryptocurrency market appeals to me by many things and is not specific to any one object. I feel confident in myself when I join after a long time of research, and I use the word "grateful" because this market has created an environment for me to see many cognitive issues in my life. And after all, agree with me about the all-encompassing ETH.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Definitely bitcoin, but if you are asking about altcoins then my biggest holding is on avalanche project. Itd an L1 like eth, but have different and has unique features. I also have atom, fantom holdings. These are L1 too with different features. I am also trying to invest on new projects but definitely will look on new ones like arbitrum, zksync, starkware, and layerzero.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: GZgidnick on March 19, 2023, 12:18:28 PMAmbitions project that aims to solve major problem; - sometimes a problem that we may not even face in the near future...Honestly, many of these projects that are trying to solve in reality, there's no need for them to solve it as there's no problem or there's already a solution on it that has been made by bitcoin.There's no need for them to make a project that deals with those specific problems because what they did is just trying to make a profit out of it while they think that people are foolish enough to believe what they say.Kind of harsh reality but that's it, if there are no investors that are only giving attention to those projects through marketing and good words at the beginning then there won't be new generation of projects that's no use at all.
